meanings.sent1: The jalopies in the junkyard had rusted wheels.
meanings.sent2: My grandpa loves fixing up old jalopies as a hobby.
meanings.sent3: The jalopies in the race looked like they were going to fall apart any second.
meanings.sent4: The jalopies lined up on the street resembled a row of forgotten memories.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the jalopies' engines echoed through the quiet neighborhood.

meanings.sent1: We saw several jalopies parked along the roadside during our road trip.
meanings.sent2: The jalopies in the used car lot were priced very low.
meanings.sent3: The jalopies in the movie were so beat-up they barely made it to the finish line.
meanings.sent4: The jalopies on the farm served as makeshift storage units for tools and equipment.
meanings.sent5: The smell of gasoline filled the air as the jalopies sputtered to life.
